history.proof: srun best use: all_permutations_aux_permutation unfold: all_permutations.

original: intros l1 l2 H. induction H. - apply permutation_nil. - intros H'. inversion H'; subst. apply permutation_skip. apply IHpermutation. auto. - apply permutation_swap. - intros H1 H2. apply permutation_trans with (l2 := l2); auto.
